middleware.name: BTSDK Shared Includes
middleware.desc: BTSDK shared headers used by all WICED applications.

middleware.name: BTSDK Tools
middleware.desc: BTSDK shared tools used by all WICED applications.

middleware.name: BTSDK Utilities
middleware.desc:
BTSDK shared utilities usable for all WICED applications

Utilities included:
  • BTSpy: Tracing utility to collect HCI and application traces, and Bluetooth snoop logs.
  • wmbt: WICED manufacturing Bluetooth test tool (WMBT) is used to test and verify the RF performance of Infineon SoC Bluetooth BR/EDR/LE devices
  • ecdsa256: Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm

middleware.name: BTSDK Host Apps for Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth Low Energy
middleware.desc: Windows, Linux, and macOS based host apps for Bluetooth such as ClientControl.

middleware.name: BTSDK Host and Peer Apps for Mesh
middleware.desc: Windows, Linux, and macOS based host apps to control LE Mesh embedded apps; and Windows, Android, and iOS based peer apps to configure and provision LE Mesh embedded apps.

middleware.name: BTSDK Peer Apps for LE
middleware.desc: Windows and Android based peer apps for LE such as hello_sensor.

middleware.name: BTSDK Peer Apps for OTA
middleware.desc: Windows, Android, and iOS based peer apps for OTA.

middleware.name: CYW20706A2
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20706 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.

middleware.name: CYW20819A1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20819, CYW20820, and CYW89820 are ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU devices. They have a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. They are identical except that the CYW20820 and CYW89820 have an internal Power Amplifier (iPA) with programmable BDR transmit power up to 10.5 dBm. CYW208XX is used to refer to all those parts.

middleware.name: CYW20820A1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20819, CYW20820, and CYW89820 are ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU devices. They have a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. They are identical except that the CYW20820 and CYW89820 have an internal Power Amplifier (iPA) with programmable BDR transmit power up to 10.5 dBm. CYW208XX is used to refer to all those parts.

middleware.name: CYW43012C0
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW43012 is a 28nm ultra-low power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR, EDR, and LE.

middleware.name: CYW20719B2
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20719 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.

middleware.name: CYW20721B2
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20721 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.

middleware.name: CYW20739B2
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20739 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.1 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.

middleware.name: CYW55572A1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW55572 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.

middleware.name: CYW20735B1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20735 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR and LE. EDR is not supported.

middleware.name: CYW20736A1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20736 is an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR and LE. EDR is not supported.

middleware.name: CYW20835B1
middleware.desc: The Infineon CYW20835 is an ultra-low-power Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0 wireless MCU device. It has a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE. BR/EDR is not supported.

middleware.name: BTSDK Shared Source
middleware.desc: BTSDK common shared source used by all WICED applications.

middleware.name: Audio
middleware.desc: WICED audio-related libraries.

version.desc:
3.1.0 release

Libraries included:
  • AVRC Controller Profile (avrc_controller)
  • AVRC Target Profile (avrc_target)
  • Hands-free Profile (handsfree_profile)
  • Audio Gateway Profile (hfp_audio_gateway)
  • Audio Sink Profile (a2dp_sink_profile)
  • Apple Media Service (ams)
  • Apple Notification Center Service (ancs)
  • Audio Insert Funtionality (audio_insert_lib)
  • Button Management Support (button_manager)
  • LED Management Support (led_manager)
  • Audio Manager (audiomanager)
  • Headset/Speaker Support (bt_hs_spk_lib)
  • AK4679 Codec Support (codec_ak4679_lib)
  • CYW9BT Audio Support (cyw9bt_audio and cyw9bt_audio2)
  • CS47l35 Codec Support (codec_cs47l35_lib)
  • Audio Record Support (audio_record_lib)
  • WICED HCI Control Of Audio Streaming (audio_uart)

Libraries included:

middleware.name: Bluetooth Low Energy
middleware.desc:
WICED Bluetooth Low Energy Profile libraries.

Libraries included:
  • Alert Notification Client (anc_lib)
  • Alert Notification Server (ans_lib)
  • Battery Service Client (bat_client_lib)
  • Beacon support for both iBeacon and Eddystone (beacon_lib)
  • Heart Rate Client (hrc_lib)
  • Heart Rate Server (hrs_lib)
  • LE GATT Utilities (gatt_utils_lib)

middleware.name: Human Interface Device
middleware.desc: HID Device library

middleware.name: Google Fast Pairing Service
middleware.desc: Google Fast Pairing Service (gfps_provider)

middleware.name: Mesh
middleware.desc:
WICED Mesh libraries.

Libraries included:
  • Mesh Application Library (mesh_app_lib)

middleware.name: Firmware Upgrade
middleware.desc: Over-The-Air Firmware Upgrade support (fw_upgrade_lib)

middleware.name: RFCOMM
middleware.desc:
WICED Bluetooth RFCOMM Profile libraries.

Libraries included:
  • Message Access Client Profile (map_lib)
  • Phone Book Access Profile (pbap_lib)
  • Serial Port Profile (spp_lib)
  • Object Push Profile (opp_lib)
  • Object Exchange Protocol (obex_lib)

middleware.name: Drivers
middleware.desc:
WICED drivers libraries

Libraries included:
  • Library to convert HSL Color to RGB Color values (hsl_rgb_lib)
  • Library providing API implementation for NCP15XV103E03RC thermistor (thermistor_ncp15xv103_lib)
  • Library providing API implementation for NCU15WF104F60RC thermistor (thermistor_ncu15wf104_lib)
  • ALS (Ambient Light Sensor) library for MAX44009 ALS (ambient_light_sensor_lib)
  • PIR (Passive Infrared Motion Sensor) library for e93196 motion sensor (pir_motion_sensor_lib)
